channel.title: Hi, I'm Dan Syme from Cartalyst.com
channel.description:
Hey Everyone, Dan Syme from http://www.cartalyst.com
This forum is a great idea, glad to see Ian take the initiative here. Ready to share and gain knowledge.

item.description:
Hi Dan,
